title: Coronavirus Worries
alt: Offscreen, bottom left: Whether the customÂ :coronavirus: Slack react emoji you just added was public domain or whether you should have put a Creative Commons credit somewhere
transcript:
[A scatter-plot, with 8 labeled dots. Both axis are labeled but neither has an arrow at its end. The dots are scattered from left to right and top to bottom. Below all labels are given, first for the axis, and then for each dot in approximately normal reading order, left to right top to bottom, but in the order it would make sense to read them:]
Y-axis: More healthy
X-axis: More common[Top left]: Whether you're remembering to drink water and rest
[Very top, near right]: Whether you're able to stay home
[Top leaning, right]: Whether your friends and family are able to stay home
[Very bottom, near left]: Whether forgetting to drink water or rest will make you get the coronavirus
[Middle, leaning right]: Whether your government is reacting wrong
[Toward bottom right]: Whether you're getting enough work done
[Very bottom center]: Whether random people in a news story are reacting wrong
[Very bottom right]: Whether you have the virus because you just coughed and last week you touched a doorknob
